name: Type'EmUp!
description:
A Shoot'em Up & Typing Game! Made for Ludum Dare 41 with 48 hours.

-Controls (*Commands)

You need to type for controlling your ship. Write down the commands and press enter! Destroy the incoming enemy ships and survive as long as you can.

gox value => Goes to the value typed in on x axis

Eg. gox 3, goes to unit 3 on x axis.

goy value => Goes to the value typed in on y axis

Eg. goy 3, goes to unit 3 on y axis.

upgrade abilityname => upgrades the ability by one. Every upgrade costs 20$

Eg. upgrade movespeed, decreases movespeed one second.
